articles.content:
Vincent Kompany insists Scott Twine's time will come for Burnley after the attacker failed to feature for the Clarets in their FA Cup win over Bournemouth on Saturday.

articles.title: Damar Hamlin posts on Instagram for the first time since his cardiac arrest - Daily Mail
articles.description: Damar Hamlin has posted on social media for the first time since his cardiac arrest on Monday, thanking fans for the support he has received.
articles.content:
Damar Hamlin has posted on social media for the first time since his cardiac arrest on Monday, thanking fans for the support he has received in an emotional statement.
